analysis.description:
LuckyTree.unlockFunds (/unique_chucks/29/0x174bb5d84b78e9e2248e7aa2c789aeba82f72f68.sol#254-280) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- totalLockedAmount == 0

	- require(bool)(IERC20Token(tokenAddress).balanceOf(address(this)) >= _value + totalParticipationAmount) (/unique_chucks/29/0x174bb5d84b78e9e2248e7aa2c789aeba82f72f68.sol#359-363)

	State variables written after the call(s):
